story: As a care professional, I want to save a reimbursement so that I can save from the top bar in one tap.
As a traveler, I want to get trip updates so that I receive email notifications.
As a shopper, I want product availability to update so that I see changes instantly without refreshing.
As an admin, I want to back up reports so that they are stored in S3.
As a user, I want to log in so that I can continue with Google.
